body:
This PR:

- Adds DAG scheduling (using "needs" instead of "dependencies" in yaml)
- Jobs expose and consume buildcache artifacts more specifically, when enabled
- Removes extra step of pushing generated yaml as a commit, in favor of dynamic child pipelines
- Adds support for embedding `$padding` in `config/install_tree`

In order to re-trigger gitlab pipelines using the correct access token, I needed to close the previous PR (#16027) and open a new one.
title: Add PR testing using pipelines
